entry.title: DynamoDB and DynamoDB-Mapper
entry.summary:
Description

Montreal, Oct. 22, 2012 - Maxime Noël presents dynamodb-mapper -- a DynamoDB object mapper, based on boto.

Useful links:

  • dynamodb-mapper: https://bitbucket.org/maxnoel/dynamodb-mapper
  • MP32: http://montrealpython.org/2012/10/mp32/
  • Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
  • Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com

entry.title: DynamoDB and DynamoDB-Mapper -- Building scalable Python applications with Amazon's NoSQL database
entry.summary:
Summary

In January 2012, Amazon introduced DynamoDB, a NoSQL database service with seamless, linear scalability. How can we neatly integrate it in Python applications and address its shortcomings?
